author: barnabemonnot
content: additionally it's really hard for a block to be _exactly_ 30M gas, it'd likely be a few percentage points below anyways, which could add up to 2x being enough to cover 6 full-ish blocks

author: sky.cactus
content: Hmm, does the average block being 10,500 gas shy of full result in 2x working out as 6 blocks?

author: sky.cactus
content: I thought (get) it would still came out to just start in that case.
